rdf:Description.dc:title: Teens and careers : a parent's guide 1994 a parent's guide
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Advanced Education and Career Development. Information Development and Marketing Branch.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton, AB : Alberta Advanced Education and Career Development, Information Development and Marketing Branch,
rdf:Description.dc:description: Guide for adults who want to help teenagers make good education and career decisions, providing information, exercises, and suggestions along with ideas for further information.

The booklet covers trends and future jobs; living with teens and how to help them do well; exercises and checklists to help teens discover their interests, work values, and skills; how to translate skills and interests into occupations and how to gain experience; and post-secondary options and the importance of life-long learning.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Career development.
Youth
